page.title: 10GRASS SKIING
page.content: {Grass skiing}at {Ashton Court}is quite popular.People who go skiing at { {Ashton court}often fall over on their skis because the skis touch together and make them trip.Skiing on grass is great fun if you know how to do it properly.The skis have wheels with a band round. Now there is a fear that {Ashton court}may be closed down to the {public}because the council may open it as a hotel with the rest of the land { private,or have it as a hotel with the land open to public.There is a great possibility that it may be opened to public as a{sports centre}which alot of people hope for.
